General.Name: HLA GROUP CORP LTD
General.Description: Hla Group Corp., Ltd. manufactures and sells menswear, womenswear, kids, professional, and home furnishing products in China. The company offers T-shirts, shirts, pants, suits, jackets, and other products under the Hailan Home brand name; men's and women's suits, trousers, vests, skirts, shirts, jackets, coats, and windbreakers under the SANCANAL brand name; and office supplies, cosmetics, tableware, kitchen supplies, bedding, nursing care products, travel products, daily necessities, clothing, sports, and food and furniture products under the Heilan Select brand name. It also provides cashmere, pure wool worsted, and silk fabrics; men's clothing under the Black Whale brand name; children's fashion and casual clothing under the HEYLADS brand name; baby underwear, outdoor clothes, children's beds, bedding, car chairs, shoes, hats, socks, washing, and other products under the YeeHoO brand name; and sports equipment under the HEAD brand name. The company was formerly known as HLA CORP., Ltd. and changed its name to Hla Group Corp., Ltd. in March 2021. Hla Group Corp., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Jiangyin, China.
